name: Cadence (itch) (katie_P)
description:
"Cadence" is a training game to help Scrum Masters develop servant leadership skills.  It's pretty specialized and won't mean much if you are not at least familiar with Scrum and Agile.

The original version was built in Twine and we are currently converting to RPG Maker in order to improve the customer experience.

This is not a finished game.  Check back frequently for updates.

Update 12/21/20:  The game now runs sprint, retros, and commits to new sprints.  

Update 12/22/20:  Door bug fixed.  Customer now evaluates backlog and player rank.

Update 12/23/20:  Agile score events complete.  Backlog event complete.  First closed Beta.

Update 12/24/03:  Player now experiences frustration (tiredness) with negative consequences.  Several dialog options added.

If you'd like to support our mission to provide fun, free, Agile and Servant Leadership training games, you can find our Patreon here:

https://www.patreon.com/NogginBrain?fan_landing=true

TY!

Kate
